channel.title: Converting my .bat files to .sh
channel.description:
[code]"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_55\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java[/code]
I need this converted to a .sh.
If it matters, my java location is: /usr/java/jdk.1.8.0_05
How do I convert it?

item.title: Converting my .bat files to .sh
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Gabinhash, post:1, topic:542594”]"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_55\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java

I need this converted to a .sh.

If it matters, my java location is:
/usr/java/jdk.1.8.0_05

How do I convert it?[/quote]

javac -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java

EDIT: and btw is that the 508 davidscape

Read full topic
